attributes.action: The BBC have breached their charter, fine them. To be paid to the Labour party.
attributes.background: The BBC admitting to coordinating the broadcast of Steven Doughty's resignation. This puts them in breach of impartiality rules in their charter. They should be fined and it should be paid to the CLP as recognition of this breach.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The BBC Trust is responsible for investigating breaches of the BBC Charter.

You can get in touch with the BBC Trust using the following website:

http://www.bbc.co.uk/bbctrust/contact_us
